about.title: Who I Am
about.description: I'm Jérémie, a full-stack developer with a focus on Python automation and geospatial solutions, offering tailored web app development, e-commerce platforms, and GIS-driven process automation.

service1.title: Custom Web App Development
service1.description: Building tailored web applications that serve e-commerce, automation, and geospatial needs—creating solutions that scale with your business.

service2.title: E-commerce Solutions
service2.description: I develop scalable, secure e-commerce platforms integrated with payment gateways, inventory management, and performance analytics to boost your online business.

service3.title: Automation & GIS Solutions
service3.description: From automating repetitive processes to geospatial data analysis, I create systems that streamline workflows and reduce manual tasks, with a focus on Python and GIS technologies.

cta_section.title: Let's Bring Your Project to Life
cta_section.description: Whether you’re looking to automate tasks, build a new web platform, or launch an e-commerce site, I’m here to help. Let’s work together to create a solution that works for you.

resume_portfolio.title: Explore My Work
resume_portfolio.description: Check out my resume and portfolio to learn more about the projects I've delivered, including automation systems, web applications, and geospatial tools.
